titleStmt.title: A Most excellent ballad of an old man and his wife who in their great want and misery sought to children for succour, by whom they were disdained, and scornefully sent away succourlesse, and Gods vengeance shewed vpon them for the same : to the tune of Priscilla.

notesStmt.note: Date of imprint suggested by STC (2nd ed.).
Bound and filmed with "A most notable example of an vngracious son" (STC 10610.3, cataloged separately).
Reproduction of original in the Pepys Library.
